resources.string: Post-Workout: Stretch and cool down. Some abbreviated stretch and cool down sessions are filmed into the newer workout videos. However, everyone is different and some require more flexibilityand cool down practices. Get more flexibility training, coaching and a plethora of workouts in the memberâ€™s section!

Please try not to overlook this important staple to any workout program. If strapped for time, try to move until at a sweat, but just remember the body performs best and is less injury prone when warm. To maximize this philosophy, use the RundleFit Dynamic Warm-Up below before all workouts.
